desc.cn: Tinygo 是现有编程语言的新编译器，即 GO 编程语言
desc.en: TinyGo is a new compiler for an existing programming language, the Go programming language

debian/wget.cmd:
wget https://github.com/tinygo-org/tinygo/releases/download/v0.31.0/tinygo_0.31.0_amd64.deb \
&& sudo dpkg -i tinygo_0.31.0_amd64.deb \
&& export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin

ubuntu/wget.cmd:
wget https://github.com/tinygo-org/tinygo/releases/download/v0.31.0/tinygo_0.31.0_amd64.deb \
&& sudo dpkg -i tinygo_0.31.0_amd64.deb \
&& export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin

raspbian/apt.cmd:
wget https://github.com/tinygo-org/tinygo/releases/download/v0.31.0/tinygo_0.31.0_armhf.deb \
&& sudo dpkg -i tinygo_0.31.0_armhf.deb \
&& export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin

darwin/brew.cmd: brew tap tinygo-org/tools && brew install tinygo
